metadata.description: Definitions for all indicators computed by the Afghanistan Trade Intelligence Tool
metadata.purpose: Provides clear explanations for dashboard users to understand trade intelligence metrics

export_value.name: Afghanistan Export Value (2024)
export_value.description: Total value of Afghanistan's exports to this specific market in USD for the latest year (2024)
export_value.calculation: Sum of trade values for all HS codes in the latest year (2024)
export_value.importance: Shows the current size of Afghanistan's trade relationship with each market

global_market_size.name: Global Market Size (2024)
global_market_size.description: Total value of all countries' imports of this product globally in the latest year (2024)
global_market_size.calculation: Sum of import values for the product across all importing countries in 2024
global_market_size.importance: Represents the current global demand for this product

market_rank.name: Market Rank
market_rank.description: Afghanistan's ranking among all suppliers to this market by export value
market_rank.calculation: Ranking based on export value compared to all other countries exporting to this market
market_rank.importance: Shows Afghanistan's competitive position in each market

market_share_pct.name: Market Share Percentage (2024)
market_share_pct.description: Afghanistan's share of the total imports in this market for the latest year (2024)
market_share_pct.calculation: (Afghanistan's exports to market in 2024 / Total market imports in 2024) × 100
market_share_pct.importance: Indicates Afghanistan's current penetration in each market

afghanistan_rank.name: Afghanistan's Global Rank
afghanistan_rank.description: Afghanistan's ranking among all importing countries globally for this product
afghanistan_rank.calculation: Ranking based on total import value across all products
afghanistan_rank.importance: Shows how important this market is globally for this product

yoy_growth_pct.name: Year-over-Year Growth
yoy_growth_pct.description: Average annual percentage change in Afghanistan's exports to this market
yoy_growth_pct.calculation: ((Current Year - Previous Year) / Previous Year) × 100, averaged across years
yoy_growth_pct.importance: Indicates growth trend in Afghanistan's market position

cagr_pct.name: Compound Annual Growth Rate
cagr_pct.description: The geometric progression ratio that provides a constant rate of return over the time period
cagr_pct.importance: Shows the smoothed annual growth rate over the entire period

growth_percentage.name: Absolute Growth Percentage
growth_percentage.description: Total percentage increase from first to last year of analysis
growth_percentage.calculation: ((Last Year Value - First Year Value) / First Year Value) × 100
growth_percentage.importance: Shows the total change over the analysis period

unit_price.name: Unit Price (2024)
unit_price.description: Average price per unit of Afghanistan's exports in the latest year (2024)
unit_price.calculation: Total export value in 2024 / Total export quantity in 2024
unit_price.importance: Indicates the current price level of Afghanistan's products

market_avg_price.name: Market Average Price
market_avg_price.description: Average price per unit across all suppliers to this market
market_avg_price.calculation: Total market import value / Total market import quantity
market_avg_price.importance: Represents the typical price level in this market

price_vs_market_pct.name: Price vs Market Percentage
price_vs_market_pct.description: How Afghanistan's price compares to the market average
price_vs_market_pct.importance: Shows pricing competitiveness relative to market standards

price_competitiveness.name: Price Competitiveness
price_competitiveness.description: Categorical assessment of Afghanistan's pricing strategy
price_competitiveness.importance: Provides actionable insight into pricing strategy

avg_competitor_price.name: Average Competitor Price
avg_competitor_price.description: Average price of Afghanistan's main competitors in this market
avg_competitor_price.calculation: Mean price of top 5 competitors by market share
avg_competitor_price.importance: Shows competitor pricing levels for comparison

price_rank.name: Price Rank
price_rank.description: Afghanistan's price ranking among all suppliers to this market
price_rank.calculation: Ranking by unit price (1 = lowest price)
price_rank.importance: Shows pricing position relative to competitors

data_quality_notes.mirror_data: Afghanistan export data is derived from mirror statistics (partner countries' import records) since Afghanistan does not report direct export data
data_quality_notes.hs_codes: Analysis covers multiple HS codes per product for comprehensive coverage
data_quality_notes.time_period: Analysis covers 4-year period (2021-2024) for trend analysis
data_quality_notes.market_coverage: Top 10 global import markets analyzed per product

methodology.data_source: UN Comtrade API via mirror statistics
methodology.time_period_analysis: Most indicators based on latest year (2024) for current market assessment. Growth rates calculated across all years for trend analysis.
methodology.aggregation: Data aggregated by market and year for multi-dimensional analysis
methodology.ranking: Global rankings based on most recent year (2024) data
methodology.growth_calculation: Compound growth rates calculated using geometric mean across all available years
methodology.price_analysis: Unit prices calculated as value/quantity ratios for latest year data
